verses.verse: "You shall therefore love <WH157> the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and always <WH3605> <WH3117> keep <WH8104> His charge, <WH4931> His statutes, <WH2708> His ordinances, <WH4941> and His commandments. <WH4687>

"And know <WH3045> this day <WH3117> that I [am] not [speaking] with your sons <WH1121> who <WH834> have not known <WH3045> and who <WH834> have not seen <WH7200> the discipline <WH4148> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> – His greatness, <WH1433> His mighty <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and His outstretched <WH5186> arm, <WH2220>

and His signs <WH226> and His works <WH4639> which <WH834> He did <WH6213> in the midst <WH8432> of Egypt <WH4714> to Pharaoh <WH6547> the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> and to all <WH3605> his land; <WH776>

and what <WH834> He did <WH6213> to Egypt's army, <WH2428> to its horses <WH5483> and its chariots, <WH7393> when <WH834> He made the water <WH4325> of the Red <WH5488> <WH3220> Sea <WH3220> to engulf <WH6687> them while they were pursuing <WH7291> you, and the Lord <WH3068> completely <WH5704> <WH3117> <WH2088> destroyed them;
and what <WH834> He did <WH6213> to you in the wilderness <WH4057> until <WH5704> you came <WH935> to this <WH2088> place; <WH4725>

and what <WH834> He did <WH6213> to Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram, <WH48> the sons <WH1121> of Eliab, <WH446> the son <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> when the earth <WH776> opened <WH6475> its mouth <WH6310> and swallowed <WH1104> them, their households, <WH1004> their tents, <WH168> and every <WH3605> living <WH3351> thing <WH3351> that followed <WH7272> them, among <WH7130> all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> –
but your own eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> all <WH3605> the great <WH1419> work <WH4639> of the Lord <WH3068> which <WH834> He did. <WH6213>

"You shall therefore keep <WH8104> every <WH3605> commandment <WH4687> which <WH834> I am commanding <WH6680> you today, <WH3117> so <WH4616> that you may be strong <WH2388> and go <WH935> in and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> into which <WH834> you are about to cross <WH5674> to possess <WH3423> it;

so that you may prolong <WH748> [your] days <WH3117> on the land <WH127> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to your fathers to give <WH1> to them and to their descendants, <WH5414> a land <WH2233> flowing <WH776> with milk <WH2100> and honey. <WH2461>

"For the land, <WH776> into which <WH834> you are entering <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it, is not like the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> from which <WH834> you came, <WH3318> where <WH834> you used to sow <WH2232> your seed <WH2233> and water <WH8248> it with your foot <WH7272> like a vegetable <WH3419> garden. <WH1588>

"But the land <WH776> into which <WH834> you are about to cross <WH5674> to possess <WH3423> it, a land <WH776> of hills <WH2022> and valleys, <WH1237> drinks <WH8354> water <WH4325> from the rain <WH4306> of heaven, <WH8064>

a land <WH776> for which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> cares; <WH1875> the eyes <WH5869> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> are always <WH8548> on it, from the beginning <WH7225> even to the end <WH319> of the year. <WH8141>

"And it shall come <WH1961> about, if <WH518> you listen <WH8085> obediently <WH8085> to my commandments <WH4687> which <WH834> I am commanding <WH6680> you today, <WH3117> to love <WH157> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> and to serve <WH5647> Him with all <WH3605> your heart <WH3824> and all <WH3605> your soul, <WH5315>

that He will give <WH5414> the rain <WH4306> for your land <WH776> in its season, <WH6256> the early <WH3138> and late <WH4456> rain, <WH3138> <WH4456> that you may gather <WH622> in your grain <WH1715> and your new <WH8492> wine <WH8492> and your oil. <WH3323>
"And He will give <WH5414> grass <WH6212> in your fields <WH7704> for your cattle, <WH929> and you shall eat <WH398> and be satisfied. <WH7646>
"Beware, <WH8104> lest <WH6435> your hearts <WH3824> be deceived <WH6601> and you turn <WH5493> away <WH5493> and serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430> and worship <WH7812> them.

"Or the anger <WH639> of the Lord <WH3068> will be kindled <WH2734> against you, and He will shut <WH6113> up the heavens <WH8064> so that there will be no <WH3808> rain <WH4306> and the ground <WH127> will not yield <WH5414> its fruit; <WH2981> and you will perish quickly <WH6> from the good <WH4120> land <WH2896> which <WH776> the Lord <WH834> is giving <WH3068> you.

"You shall therefore impress <WH7760> these <WH428> words <WH1697> of mine on your heart <WH3824> and on your soul; <WH5315> and you shall bind <WH7194> them as a sign <WH226> on your hand, <WH3027> and they shall be as frontals <WH2903> on your forehead. <WH996> <WH5869>

"And you shall teach <WH3925> them to your sons, <WH1121> talking <WH1696> of them when you sit <WH3427> in your house <WH1004> and when you walk <WH1980> along the road <WH1870> and when you lie <WH7901> down <WH7901> and when you rise <WH6965> up.
"And you shall write <WH3789> them on the doorposts <WH4201> of your house <WH1004> and on your gates, <WH8179>

so <WH4616> that your days <WH3117> and the days <WH3117> of your sons <WH1121> may be multiplied <WH7235> on the land <WH127> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to your fathers to give <WH1> them, as long <WH5414> as the heavens <WH3117> [remain] above <WH8064> the earth. <WH5921>

"For if <WH518> you are careful <WH8104> to keep <WH8104> all <WH3605> this <WH2088> commandment <WH4687> which <WH834> I am commanding <WH6680> you, to do <WH6213> it, to love <WH157> the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> to walk <WH1980> in all <WH3605> His ways <WH1870> and hold <WH1692> fast <WH1692> to Him;

then the Lord <WH3068> will drive <WH3423> out all <WH3605> these <WH428> nations <WH1471> from before <WH4480> <WH6440> you, and you will dispossess <WH3423> nations <WH1471> greater <WH1419> and mightier <WH6099> than <WH4480> you.

"Every <WH3605> place <WH4725> on which <WH834> the sole <WH3709> of your foot <WH7272> shall tread <WH1869> shall be yours; your border <WH1366> shall be from the wilderness <WH4057> to Lebanon, <WH3844> [and] from the river, <WH5104> the river <WH5104> Euphrates, <WH6578> as far <WH5704> as the western <WH314> sea. <WH3220>

"There shall no <WH3808> man <WH376> be able to stand <WH3320> before <WH6440> you; the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> shall lay <WH5414> the dread <WH6343> of you and the fear <WH4172> of you on all <WH3605> the land <WH776> on which <WH834> you set <WH1869> foot, <WH1869> as He has spoken <WH1696> to you.
"See, <WH7200> I am setting <WH5414> before <WH6440> you today <WH3117> a blessing <WH1293> and a curse: <WH7045>
the blessing, <WH1293> if <WH834> you listen <WH8085> to the commandments <WH4687> of the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> which <WH834> I am commanding <WH6680> you today; <WH3117>

and the curse, <WH7045> if <WH518> you do not listen <WH8085> to the commandments <WH4687> of the Lord <WH3068> your God, <WH430> but turn <WH5493> aside <WH5493> from the way <WH1870> which <WH834> I am commanding <WH6680> you today, <WH3117> by following <WH1980> <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430> which <WH834> you have not known. <WH3045>

"And it shall come <WH1961> about, when <WH3588> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> brings <WH935> you into the land <WH776> where <WH834> <WH8033> you are entering <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it, that you shall place <WH5414> the blessing <WH1293> on Mount <WH2022> Gerizim <WH1630> and the curse <WH7045> on Mount <WH2022> Ebal. <WH9403>

"Are they not across <WH5676> the Jordan, <WH3383> west <WH310> of the way <WH1870> toward the sunset, <WH8121> <WH3996> in the land <WH776> of the Canaanites <WH3669> who live <WH3427> in the Arabah, <WH6160> opposite <WH4136> Gilgal, <WH1537> beside <WH681> the oaks <WH436> of Moreh <WH4176>?

"For you are about to cross <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> to go <WH935> in to possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which <WH834> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> is giving <WH5414> you, and you shall possess <WH3423> it and live <WH3427> in it,
and you shall be careful <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all <WH3605> the statutes <WH2706> and the judgments <WH4941> which <WH834> I am setting <WH5414> before <WH6440> you today. <WH3117>
